spell_tooltip.description: Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 560,592 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Natural Mending now reduces the cooldown of Exhilaration by an additional 0.5 sec

Mend Pet heals for an additional 25% of your pet's health over its duration, and has a 25% chance to dispel a magic effect each time it heals your pet.

Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Tranquilizing Shot removes up to 1 additional Magic effect from up to 2 nearby targets.
Misdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Aimed Shot deals 10% increased damage.
When Tranquilizing Shot successfully dispels an effect or Counter Shot interrupts a cast, gain 10 Focus.

Your Spotting Eagle descends from the skies, stunning your target for 5 sec.

This ability does not require line of sight when used against players.
Fires an explosive shot at your target. After 3 sec, the shot will explode, dealing 682,077 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yds for 10 sec, stunning them for 3 sec if they move more than 5 yds from the arrow.
Fires an explosion of bolts at all enemies in front of you, knocking them back, snaring them by 50% for 6 sec, and dealing 8,599 Physical damage.

You and your pet have 5.0% increased attack speed.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
The damage of Explosive Shot is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Movement speed increased by 4%.
You and your pet blend into the surroundings and gain stealth for 1 min. While camouflaged, you will heal for 2% of maximum health every 1 sec.
Your movement speed is increased by 30% anytime you have not attacked for 3 sec.
You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.
Feign Death and Aspect of the Turtle removes poison and disease effects from you.
Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 60,806 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.
A powerful aimed shot that deals 857,629 Physical damage.

Shoot a stream of 10 shots at your target over 1.8 sec, dealing a total of 1.6 million Physical damage. Usable while moving.

Rapid Fire causes your next Aimed Shot to cast 20% faster.

Each shot generates 2 Focus.

Aimed Shot causes your next Arcane Shot or Multi-Shot to deal 100% more damage and cost 40% less Focus.

Your Auto Shot damage is increased by 100% but the time between your Auto Shots is increased by 2.0 sec.

Rapid Fire's damage is increased by 15%. Casting Rapid Fire grants Streamline.

 Streamline
Your next Aimed Shot has its Focus cost and cast time reduced by 20%. Stacks up to 2 times.
When Multi-Shot hits 3 or more targets, your next Aimed Shot or Rapid Fire will ricochet and hit up to 5 additional targets for 75% of normal damage.

Rapid Fire shoots 3 additional shots.
Aimed Shot cooldown reduced by 1.0 sec.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 40% of your critical strike chance.

The damage bonus of Spotter's Mark is increased by 20%.

 Spotter's Mark
Damaging an enemy with abilities empowered by Precise Shots has a 30% chance to apply Spotter's Mark to the primary target, causing your next Aimed Shot to deal 40% increased damage to the target.
Your ranged auto attacks have a 8% chance to trigger Lock and Load, causing your next Aimed Shot to cost no Focus and be instant.
When Rapid Fire finishes channeling, the time between your Auto Shots is reduced by 1.0 sec for 12 sec.
Rapid Fire deals 35% additional damage, and Aimed Shot has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Rapid Fire.

Your Spotting Eagle gains the Tenacity specialization, granting you Endurance Training and Air Superiority.

 Endurance Training
You gain 5% increased maximum health.

 Air Superiority
Your Spotting Eagle alerts you to oncoming danger, reducing all damage you take by 3%
Your ranged ability critical strikes cause the target to bleed for an additional 15% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.

Consuming Spotter's Mark grants 4% increased Haste for 10 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Multiple instances of this effect can overlap.

Increases your critical strike chance by 20% and critical strike damage by 40% for 15 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of your Aimed Shot and Rapid Fire by 60%.

Consuming Spotter's Mark reduces the cooldown of Trueshot by 3.0 sec

Consuming Precise Shots increases the damage of your next Aimed Shot by 20% and grants Streamline.

  Streamline
Your next Aimed Shot has its Focus cost and cast time reduced by 20%. Stacks up to 2 times.

Casting Explosive Shot grants Streamline.

When Aimed Shot damages a target affected by your Explosive Shot, Explosive Shot instantly explodes, dealing 25% increased damage.

 Streamline
Your next Aimed Shot has its Focus cost and cast time reduced by 20%. Stacks up to 2 times.
Rapid Fire grants Precise Shots.

Trueshot sends your Spotting Eagle into a frenzy, instantly applying Spotter's Mark to your target. 

During Trueshot, your chance to apply Spotter's Mark is increased by 100%.
Consuming Spotter's Mark reduces the cooldown of Aimed Shot by 2.0 sec.
Consuming Spotter's Mark reduces the cooldown of Trueshot by 3.0 sec.
When your abilities damage a target below 20% health, you gain 1% increased critical strike chance for 6 sec, stacking up to 60 times.

Damage from Rapid Fire increases the damage of Aimed Shot by 2% for 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

New stacks do not refresh duration and are removed upon casting Rapid Fire.

While Trueshot is active, consuming Precise Shots extends Trueshot's duration by 1.0 sec, up to 5.0 sec.


Additionally, Trueshot now increases the effectiveness of Streamline by 50%.
Rain a volley of arrows down over 6 sec, dealing up to 1.4 million Physical damage to any enemy in the area, and gain the effects of Trick Shots for as long as Volley is active.
Multi-Shot deals 75% increased damage and Explosive Shot deals 15% increased damage.
Bulletstorm now increases your critical strike damage by 2%. Additionally, Bulletstorm now stacks 5 more times.

Trueshot now increases your critical strike chance by an additional 10% and increases your critical strike damage by an additional 20%.

Additionally, Calling the Shots reduces Trueshot's cooldown by an additional 1.0 sec.
Volley now also applies Explosive Shot to up to 2 targets hit.

Your attacks have a chance to apply Sentinel on the target, stacking up to 10 times.

While Sentinel stacks are higher than 3, applying Sentinel has a chance to trigger an implosion, causing a stack to be consumed on the target every sec to deal 126,815 Arcane damage.
Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy you gain an absorb shield equal to 1.0% of your maximum health, up to 10%.
When you apply Sentinel to a target not affected by Sentinel, you apply 1 additional stack.
Aimed Shot and Rapid Fire deal 5% increased damage.
When you apply Sentinel on a target, you have a 15% chance to apply a second stack.
When Sentinel starts dealing damage, the target is snared by 40% for 3 sec.

Each time Sentinel deals damage to an enemy it has an up to 15% chance to generate 5 Focus.

Chances decrease with each additional Sentinel currently imploding applied to enemies.
Whenever a Sentinel deals damage, the cooldown of Trueshot is reduced by 1 sec, up to 15 sec.
Multi-Shot discharges arcane energy from all targets affected by your Sentinel, dealing 46,936 Arcane damage to up to 5 targets within 8 yds of your Sentinel targets.

All Sentinel debuffs implode when a target affected by more than 3 stacks of your Sentinel falls below 20% health.

This effect can only occur once every 15 sec per target.

Every 30 sec your next Rapid Fire launches a celestial arrow that conjures a 12 yd radius Lunar Storm at the target's location dealing 161,961 Arcane damage.
 
For the next 12 sec, a random enemy affected by Sentinel within your Lunar Storm gets struck for 151,838 Arcane damage every 0.4 sec. Any target struck by this effect takes 10% increased damage from you and your pet for 8 sec.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 553,516 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Natural Mending now reduces the cooldown of Exhilaration by an additional 0.5 sec

Mend Pet heals for an additional 25% of your pet's health over its duration, and has a 25% chance to dispel a magic effect each time it heals your pet.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Tranquilizing Shot removes up to 1 additional Magic effect from up to 2 nearby targets.
Misdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Aimed Shot deals 10% increased damage.

This ability does not require line of sight when used against players.

Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yds for 10 sec, stunning them for 3 sec if they move more than 5 yds from the arrow.
Fires an explosion of bolts at all enemies in front of you, knocking them back, snaring them by 50% for 6 sec, and dealing 8,745 Physical damage.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.

For the next 12 sec, a random enemy affected by Sentinel within your Lunar Storm gets struck for 151,838 Arcane damage every 0.4 sec. Any target struck by this effect takes 10% increased damage from you and your pet for 8 sec.
Bestial Wrath now provides immunity to Fear and Horror effects for you and your pets for 8 sec. Nearby allied pets are also inspired, increasing their attack speed by 10%.
Aspect of the Cheetah has 50% reduced cooldown and grants its effects to allies within 15 yds.
Victims of Freezing Trap can no longer be damaged or healed.  Freezing Trap is now undispellable, but has a 4 sec duration.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 557,798 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Natural Mending now reduces the cooldown of Exhilaration by an additional 0.5 sec

Mend Pet heals for an additional 25% of your pet's health over its duration, and has a 25% chance to dispel a magic effect each time it heals your pet.

Hurls a tar trap to the target location that creates a 8 yd radius pool of tar around itself for 30 sec when the first enemy approaches. All enemies have 50% reduced movement speed while in the area of effect. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Aimed Shot deals 10% increased damage.
When Tranquilizing Shot successfully dispels an effect or Counter Shot interrupts a cast, gain 10 Focus.
Commands your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 5 sec.
Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yds for 10 sec, stunning them for 3 sec if they move more than 5 yds from the arrow.
Fires an explosion of bolts at all enemies in front of you, knocking them back, snaring them by 50% for 6 sec, and dealing 8,546 Physical damage.

You and your pet have 5.0% increased attack speed.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
Critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Binding Shot's stun duration is increased by 1 sec.
Casting Aimed Shot reduces the cooldown of Intimidation and Binding Shot by 0.5 sec.
Movement speed increased by 4%.
You and your pet blend into the surroundings and gain stealth for 1 min. While camouflaged, you will heal for 2% of maximum health every 1 sec.
Your movement speed is increased by 30% anytime you have not attacked for 3 sec.
You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.
Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 60,458 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.
Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal 97,318 Physical damage to the enemy.

A quick shot causing 176,293 Physical damage.

Reduces the cooldown of Kill Command by 1 sec.
Your Call Pet additionally summons the pet from the bonus slot in your stable. This pet will obey your Kill Command, but cannot use pet family abilities.

Fire a shot that tears through your enemy, causing them to bleed for 400,052 damage over 12 sec.

Sends your pet into a frenzy, increasing attack speed by 30% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Generates 20 Focus over 8 sec.
Passive Focus generation increased by 125%.
Barbed Shot deals 10% increased damage, and applying Barbed Shot has a 50% chance to reset the cooldown of Kill Command.
Barbed Shot increases your critical strike chance by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Kill Command deals increased critical strike damage equal to 100% of your critical strike chance.

Fires several missiles, hitting all nearby enemies within 8 yds of your current target for 214,699 Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 5 Focus per target hit.
When your pet attacks critically strike, they cause their target to bleed for 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.
Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.
After you Multi-Shot, your pet's melee attacks also strike all nearby enemies for 80% of the damage for the next 6.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your auto shot critical strikes have a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of Barbed Shot.

Direct damage from Barbed Shot has a 30% chance to explode on impact, applying Serpent Sting and dealing 135,191 Nature damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

 Serpent Sting
Fire a shot that poisons your target, causing them to take 48,588 Nature damage instantly and an additional 224,841 Nature damage over 18 sec.
When you cast Barbed Shot, your pet stomps the ground, dealing 74,787 Physical damage to its primary target and 75,672 Physical damage to all other nearby enemies.
While Beast Cleave is active, Kill Command now also strikes nearby enemies for 80% of damage dealt. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
All pet damage dealt increased by 5%.
Kill Command damage is increased by 10%. Barbed Shot lasts 2.0 sec longer.

Sends you and your pet into a rage, instantly dealing 152,324 Physical damage to its target, and increasing all damage you both deal by 30% for 15 sec. Removes all crowd control effects from your pet.
Kill Command has a 20% chance to also summon a Dire Beast to attack your target for 8 sec.
Kill Command deals 50% increased damage against enemies below 35% health.
Barbed Shot reduces the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 12.0 sec.
Dire Beast lasts an additional 2 sec and deals 60% increased damage.

You sound the call of the wild, summoning 2 of your active pets for 20 sec. During this time, a random pet from your stable will appear every 4 sec to assault your target for 6 sec. 

Each time Call of the Wild summons a pet, the cooldown of Barbed Shot and Kill Command are reduced by 25%.
While Bestial Wrath is active, Cobra Shot resets the cooldown on Kill Command.
Activating Bestial Wrath grants 1 charge of Barbed Shot.
While Call of the Wild is active, your pets have the effects of Beast Cleave, and each time Call of the Wild summons a pet, all of your pets Stomp.
While Bestial Wrath is active, your pet's critical damage dealt is increased by 35%.

Howl of the Pack Leader causes your Kill Command to generate an additional stack of Tip of the Spear.

Summoning a Beast reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10.0 sec.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 2.0 sec.

Cobra Shot reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Howl of the Pack Leader's cooldown is reduced to 25 sec.

Your pets gain an extra 5% of your attack power.
Your Bear's periodic damage has a 10% chance to reduce the cooldown of Butchery or Flanking Strike by 2.0 sec.

Your pet's attacks increase your Wyvern's damage bonus by 1%, up to 10%.

Casting Wildfire Bomb extends the duration of your Wyvern by 5.0 sec, up to 10 additional sec.
Each time your Boar deals damage, you have a 25% chance to gain a stack of Mongoose Fury and Cobra Shot strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.

Damage from your Kill Shot sends your pets into a rage, causing all active pets within 20 yds and your Bear to pounce to the target and Smack, Claw, or Bite it.

Your pets will not leap if their target is already in melee range.

When dropping below 60% health, summon the aid of a Turtle, reducing the damage you take by 10% for 6 sec.

This effect can only occur once every 1.5 min.
When an enemy is stunned by Binding Shot, it is dragged to Binding Shot's center.
Casting Coordinated Assault grants Howl of the Pack Leader and increases the damage dealt by your Beasts by 25% and your pet by 30% for 12 sec.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
